problems_validated.problem: Businesses giving up data control when integrating with OpenAI platform

business_strategies.strategy: Platform approach - become the central hub for AI app distribution
business_strategies.implementation: Build SDK, attract developers, provide distribution to massive user base
business_strategies.expected_results: Control the AI ecosystem similar to Apple App Store
business_strategies.case_study: OpenAI's move from models to platform with Apps SDK

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage existing user base for app distribution
business_strategies.implementation: Offer developers access to hundreds of millions of ChatGPT users
business_strategies.case_study: Coursera, Figma, Canva already building integrations

problems_solutions.problem: Businesses need AI capabilities but lack resources to build custom solutions
problems_solutions.solution: Use OpenAI's Apps SDK for ready-made AI integration

startup_ideas.idea: AI-powered sports analysis tool that can pull up and analyze game footage
startup_ideas.problem_solved: difficulty in quickly accessing and analyzing specific game moments
startup_ideas.validation: mentioned as client request in transcript

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Building on a single AI platform without diversification
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Risk of platform changes making your business obsolete
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Diversify across multiple AI models and platforms
mistakes_to_avoid.example: GPT store monetization promises that never materialized

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Giving up data control for distribution
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Platform owns your data and user relationships
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Carefully evaluate trade-offs between reach and control
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Coursera potentially giving course content to OpenAI

growth_tactics.tactic: Build on OpenAI's platform for instant access to massive user base
growth_tactics.results_expected: access to hundreds of millions of users

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: focus on user engagement within the platform ecosystem
